record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - April 10, 2008)

[Page: H2190]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on H.R. 2537.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Texas?
